Package ohos.data.search.model

Interface SearchParameter


  • public interface SearchParameter
    Defines keywords of search types supported by fusion search.

    A search string is generated by JSONObject. When creating a JSONObject used for search, use the keywords defined by this class as keys, and use the subsearches as values.

    Since:
    3
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Data#DATA_SEARCH

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static String ASC
      Keyword used for sorting indexes in ascending order based on a specified field.
      static String DEFAULT_GROUP
      Keyword specifying the path where the indexes of the local device are stored.
      static String DESC
      Keyword used for sorting indexes in descending order based on a specified field.
      static String DEVICE_ID_LIST
      Keyword that maps to a JSONObject consisting of device IDs.
      static String FILTER_CONDITION
      Keyword that maps to a JSONArray consisting of specified filters.
      static String GROUP_FIELD_LIST
      Keyword that maps to a JSONArray consisting of index fields used for group search.
      static String LOWER
      Keyword used for obtaining indexes whose values are greater than a specified field value based on the lexicographical order.
      static String ORDER_BY
      Keyword that maps to a JSONObject consisting of specified sorting fields and orders.
      static String QUERY
      Keyword that maps to a JSONObject consisting of a user input and specified search fields.
      static String RAW_QUERY
      Keyword used as the key of the key-value pair (whose value is the passed search string) contained in IndexData returned by SearchAbility#deleteByQuery(String,String,String)
      static String UPPER
      Keyword used for obtaining indexes whose values are less than a specified field value based on the lexicographical order.

    • Field Detail

      • ASC

        static final String ASC
        Keyword used for sorting indexes in ascending order based on a specified field. When creating a JSONObject for sorting indexes, use a specified field as the key and use this keyword as the value. Note that you can use multiple sorting fields. When two indexes tie on the first field, the next one will be used to sort.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_GROUP

        static final String DEFAULT_GROUP
        Keyword specifying the path where the indexes of the local device are stored. When calling the SearchAbility#beginSearch(String,String) method, you should pass this keyword to groupId.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DESC

        static final String DESC
        Keyword used for sorting indexes in descending order based on a specified field. When creating a JSONObject for sorting indexes, use a specified field as the key and use this keyword as the value. Note that you can use multiple sorting fields. When two indexes tie on the first field, the next one will be used to sort.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEVICE_ID_LIST

        static final String DEVICE_ID_LIST
        Keyword that maps to a JSONObject consisting of device IDs.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FILTER_CONDITION

        static final String FILTER_CONDITION
        Keyword that maps to a JSONArray consisting of specified filters.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • GROUP_FIELD_LIST

        static final String GROUP_FIELD_LIST
        Keyword that maps to a JSONArray consisting of index fields used for group search.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LOWER

        static final String LOWER
        Keyword used for obtaining indexes whose values are greater than a specified field value based on the lexicographical order. When creating a JSONObject for a range query, use this keyword as the key and use the specified field value as the value.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ORDER_BY

        static final String ORDER_BY
        Keyword that maps to a JSONObject consisting of specified sorting fields and orders.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • QUERY

        static final String QUERY
        Keyword that maps to a JSONObject consisting of a user input and specified search fields.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • RAW_QUERY

        static final String RAW_QUERY
        Keyword used as the key of the key-value pair (whose value is the passed search string) contained in IndexData returned by SearchAbility#deleteByQuery(String,String,String)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • UPPER

        static final String UPPER
        Keyword used for obtaining indexes whose values are less than a specified field value based on the lexicographical order. When creating a JSONObject for a range query, use this keyword as the key and use the specified field value as the value.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
